lead_paragraph: BEREN--Joan Schiff. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Joan Beren. Joan's compassion and dedication helped to improve countless lives around the world. She leaves behind a loving family that will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Joan's children, Amy (Bob) Bressman, Adam (Ellen) Beren, Nancy Beren (Larry Jefferson), and Julie (Marc) Platt; her 14 grandchildren and five great- grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
